api_list.name: Retrieve Tag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yalikin-product-catalog-v1.p.rapidapi.com/tags/554"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yalikin-product-catalog-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yalikin-product-catalog-v1.p.rapidapi.com/tags/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yalikin-product-catalog-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve ProductGroup
api_list.description: Retrieves one product group (or subgroup) by its id

api_list.name: Retrieve Attributes

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Filtration for results, result should be sorted by name field, from a to z, should contain word new, should be modified or create on later then provided date(date in milleseconds format)
